availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Scottville, Kentucky, housekeeper. Kentucky native. Married to Allen Bagwell. Mother of Smith W. Bagwell, Eliza N. Bagwell, William W. Bagwell, and Asa G. Bagwell. Resident of Barren County in 1850. Housekeeper in Scottville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 1, p. 379B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottvile, Carolina District, p. 388.
